async code_SemperKI.logics.processLogics.calculateGeodesicDistance(userCoords: tuple, orgaCoords: tuple) → tuple¶

Calculate the geodesic distance between two addresses

Parameters:

  • userCoords (tuple) – The first address’ coordinates

  • orgaCoords (tuple) – The second address’ coordinates

Returns:

The distance between the two coordinates

Return type:

float | exception

code_SemperKI.logics.processLogics.logicForCloneProcesses(request: rest_framework.request.Request, oldProjectID: str, oldProcessIDs: list[str], functionName: str)¶

Duplicate selected processes. Works only for logged in users.

Parameters:

  • request (HTTP POST) – POST request from statusButtonRequest

  • projectID (str) – The project ID of the project the processes belonged to

  • processIDs (list of strings) – List of processes to be cloned

  • functionName (str) – The function name

Returns:

ResultDict or Exception and statusCode

Return type:

tuple(dict|Exception, int)
